title: Start
body:
<<detachFrom Renata Mia>>
<<moveRight Mia 50 30>>
<<moveUp Renata 10 50>>
<<moveRight Renata 10 50>>
<<moveLeft Mia 1 1>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Renata>>
<<decoupleMovementAndAnimation Mia>>
<<moveRight Renata 15 125>>
<<moveLeft Renata 10 90>>
Girl 1: You can't guard me!
<<moveLeft Mia 15 125>>
<<moveRight Mia 10 90>>
Girl 2: Take that!
<<moveRight Renata 15 120>>
<<moveLeft Renata 10 90>>
<<moveLeft Mia 15 125>>
<<moveRight Mia 10 90>>
<<moveLeft Renata 30 50>>
<<moveLeft Renata 35 40>>
Girl 1: Ahhhhhh!
<<moveLeft Mia 61 120>>
Girl 2: I've got you Renata!
<<moveRight Renata 5 20>>
<<moveRight Mia 10 20>>
Renata: *huff*...Mia, you got me...
Mia: Of course I did! It wouldn't be as fun to win if you got a broken arm!
<<moveRight Renata 3 30>>
<<moveLeft Mia 3 30>>
<<pauseFor Renata 1>>
<<moveRight Mia 8 30>>
Mia: Ok, that's enough fencing for now.
Renata: Yeah, I'm hungry!
<<attachTo Renata Mia>>
